https://github.com/bahmutov/simple-bin-h: Fails because the standard command is fed a list of files to test, rather than using an ignore
https://github.com/fastify/busboy: Fails because @stylistic/ rule does not match /* eslint-disable object-property-newline */
https://github.com/larsgw/sync-fetch: Fails due to /* eslint-env browser */ and /* eslint-env mocha */
https://github.com/olahol/react-tagsinpu: Fails because the standard command is fed a list of files to test, rather than using an ignore
https://github.com/rvagg/cborg: Fails due to /* eslint-env mocha */ and on having inline disablings of now-stylistic operator-linebreak rule
https://github.com/svelteness/svelte-jes: Fails because the jest environment is added through a command line flag to the standard command rather than through a config
https://github.com/SVG-Edit/svgedit: Fails due to missing / renamed rules
https://github.com/clinicjs/node-clinic-: Fails for issue that should have existed with latest standard as well
https://github.com/bitcoinjs/bolt11: Fails for issue that should have existed with latest standard as well
https://github.com/nvuillam/njre: Fails because while it includes standard it also includes a vanilla ESLint 9 setup and megalinter, with megalinter being configured to use prettier and being the one that runs on CI
